title: Victor Coleman: The Silent Guardian

story.text: Victor wakes up to another day as a school counselor, not yet aware of the extraordinary week ahead that will reveal his latent superpowers of empathy and mental fortification, allowing him to sense and alleviate the distress of others.

After an unusually draining day filled with intensive one-on-one sessions, Victor notices his ability to literally feel the emotions of his students, absorbing their anxiety and distress, which vanishes from their own minds.
Victor tests his newfound powers discreetly, experimenting with soothing the nerves of a whole classroom during an exam, leading to the highest scores the school has ever recorded.

Word of Victor’s incredible counseling success spreads, unknowingly backed by his powers. He is approached by more students and staff, stretching his capabilities to the limit, but he holds strong, determined to help.

His abilities become public during a school assembly where a sudden wave of panic is calmed instantly as Victor steps onto the stage, his powers activating on a scale he's never managed before, drawing out stress and projecting serenity.

Curious about the extent of his powers, Victor spends the day in a local park, subtly easing the minds of passersby, witnessing the transformation of the community’s mood firsthand, fostering peace and happiness around him.

Reflecting on his week, Victor resolves to use his powers responsibly, becoming a guardian of mental health, promising to shield the city from emotional turmoil while maintaining his role as a beloved counselor and teacher.

ending: Thus, Victor Coleman stepped into the role of a true superhero, safeguarding not just his students but his entire community with the mighty shield of empathy.
moral: The true power of a superhero lies not just in their ability to change the world, but to change it quietly for the betterment of all.
